job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: More than half of American workers live paychecktopaycheck Stuck in this cycle they collectively lose over 120 billion each year on payday loans bank overdrafts and fees Were trying to fix that by building new financial services that make it easier to plan ahead pay down debt and save And were doing it as a transparent straightforward business that only profits when our members doltbrgtltbrgtSoftware engineers at Even build the products ampamp systems that serve our members and run our company Besides writing reviewing and shipping code we collaborate deeply with others across the company from product design and data to sales compliance and customer supportltbrgtltbrgtOur stack is primarily Go  PostgreSQL on the server running on AWS via Docker and JavaScript  React Native  GraphQL  Relay on the client iOS Android and web Experience with these specific technologies isnt required but an interest in them certainly helpsltbrgtltbrgtThe salary range for this position is 105000  220000ltbrgtltbrgt
